summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.7°C) and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5594 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11133 lux), cloud levels (up 1818 m), outside temperature (up 1.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 235.9m lower than yesterday, 729.8m lower than the past week, 1818.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 831.1m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, very clammy and humid and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
